name: Tortuga (itch) (gclopez8)
description: Save your turtle friends from the clutches of Sana Rana! Tortuga is a fun side-scrolling, single-player shooter that places you in the role of the hero tortoise, Tortuga. You are joined by a trusty magical companion as you battle against a legion of enemy animals across four different worlds. Gather power ups and earn coins to upgrade your primary and secondary weapons. Defeat mini bosses every level. Unlock additional companions as you set new high scores. There are multiple difficulty levels and several game options for hours and hours of replayable fun!
